tech.creator_html: This Template is created by Joseph Animate 2021 // The Main Channel.
tech.title: Technology
tech.intro: GoNexus brings you a collection of scenes from daily life for you to re-enact and make up comical, satirical or even dramatic stories.
tech.intro_steps: The drill? 1. Select a template / 2. Choose characters / 3. Pull a script out of your best life observations / 4. Watch your masterpiece!

templates.title: Where's the pilot?
templates.desc: Flying in a 747 commercial airplane across the world is piece of cake... as long as you're not in the pilot seat. Oh boy!...

templates.title: She looks better on TV
templates.desc: Watching the latest performance from a popular singer, it's hard not to make comments throughout the show.

templates.title: Step aside, Sir!
templates.desc: A passenger sets the alarm off at the airport security check. Animate the ensuing discussion with the security officer.

templates.title: Are you on the list?
templates.desc: Striking a conversation while queuing up to get into the new trendy place in town.

templates.title: Do not disturb...
templates.desc: Imagine sitting on a toilet and someone bursts into the bathroom!... Done? Now, animate the conversation!

templates.title: Got any grapes?
templates.desc: Now what's with that customer again. Some kind of weird request?

templates.title: The President
templates.desc: It's the oval office. It's time to let the president know what you really think... Let it all out.

templates.title: Subway Encounter
templates.desc: Talking to strangers in the subway sounds like a great idea... NOT! Well. It happens anyways...

templates.title: Done your homework?
templates.desc: The bell has rung, but the teacher won't end class until the students answer some tough questions.

templates.title: A round for everyone!
templates.desc: Why is it that everyone loves to tell their life story to bartenders?

templates.title: Emergency coffee shop meeting
templates.desc: A friend in distress asked to meet in a coffee shop. Now, what's all this about?

templates.title: I'll get a small latte...
templates.desc: Small? You mean tall, right? Or maybe you want to spend a little more for a Grande?!

templates.title: B.F.D.E.?
templates.desc: Is this going to be the best or the worst first date ever? Or... is it just not a first date at all? Up to you!

templates.title: Chilling Out in the Office
templates.desc: Your characters are taking a break from a stressful day in the pantry. Now what could they be talking about?!

templates.title: You forgot the eggs, didn't you!?
templates.desc: Get imaginative. You need to deal with this kitchen face-off.

templates.title: Honey. We have to talk...
templates.desc: It's time for serious couple talk... or maybe not. This is just a bedroom chat.
